mos_evaluation_description: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score.
spk_evaluation_onlyscore: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please give a score of the speaker similarity of the voices in the audio.
mos_ABtest: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please indicate which speech sample has better quality?
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_nisqa: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score according to NISQA standards.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_somos: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score based on SOMOS standards.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_bvcc: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score in accordance with BVCC standards.
